      • askInt

        public int askInt(int start,
                  int end)
        Description: Ask an integer to the user and return the answer. It haves a minimum and a maximum.
        Parameters:
        start - The minimum integer that the user can choose.
        end - The maximum integer that the user can choose.
        Returns:
        A int that is the answer.

      • askInt

        public int askInt(int start)
        Description: Ask an integer to the user and return the answer. It only haves a minimum.
        Parameters:
        start - The minimum integer that the user can choose.
        Returns:
        A int that is the answer.

      • askDouble

        public double askDouble()
        Description: Ask a double to the user and return the answer. The minimum possible answer is 0.
        Returns:
        A double that is the answer.

      • askBoolean

        public boolean askBoolean()
        Description: Ask a boolean to the user and return the answer. The answers could be 1 if it is true or 2 if it is false.
        Returns:
        A boolean that is the answer.
